thread.title: Nevada brothel owner to Khloe Kardashian: Go to hell
thread.title_full: Nevada brothel owner to Khloe Kardashian: Go to hell - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: Nevada brothel owner to Khloe Kardashian: Go to hell
text:
Lisa J. Tolda/AP Dennis Hof poses with some of his "working girls" in the parlor of his Moonlite BunnyRanch in this 2008 photo. The owner of the Nevada brothel where Lamar Odom collapsed has a message for the NBA star's estranged wife Khlo√© Kardashian: Go to hell.
Dennis Hof said he received a call from the reality TV star's publicist Wednesday asking him to keep his mouth shut after Odom was found unconscious and frothing at the mouth at Hof's Love Ranch Vegas a day earlier.
"They asked me not to talk to the media," the chatty 69-year-old bordello owner told the Daily News. "I told her to pass on a message: Go to hell."
LAMAR ODOM HAS '50-50' SHOT AT SURVIVING FROM 3-DAY DRUG BINGE AT NEVADA BROTHEL
Kardashian rushed to Sunrise Hospital & Medical Center in Las Vegas, where Odom remained on life support Wednesday, to be by his side.
"If she really cared about this man, he wouldn't be at my place with my girls," Hof said.
Jason LaVeris/FilmMagic Khloe Kardashian rushed to Sunrise Hospital & Medical Center in Las Vegas, where Lamar Odom remained on life support. Odom and Kardashian split in 2013 after being married for six years. They had finalized their divorce this past July, but the judge had not yet signed the documents - leaving the estranged couple still legally wed.
LAMAR ODOM 'BECAME IRATE' FOLLOWING 'KEEPING UP WITH THE KARDASHIANS' EPISODE ABOUT FRIEND'S DEATH
Odom, 35, who had struggled with drug addiction , had been drinking and took at least 10 doses of "herbal Viagra" - a sex-boosting supplement - and had cocaine on him when he arrived at the ranch, according to a 911 call released by officials. He got to the brothel on Saturday.
Kardashian, 31, was joined at the hospital by her sister Kim, mom, Kris Jenner, and other friends and family Wednesday.
"She has been with him, by his side, since 8 p.m. (Tuesday)," a source told the Daily News.
